messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

problem with oracle problem with hello have problem with can log added for some days but can finish have any option can delete or add when check manage cards for week status error can you please open ticket for charge for kind regards senior infrastructure engineer infrastructure upcoming holiday none
